text: وَمَا كَانَ ٱلنَّاسُ إِلَّآ أُمَّةٗ وَٰحِدَةٗ فَٱخۡتَلَفُواْۚ وَلَوۡلَا كَلِمَةٞ سَبَقَتۡ مِن رَّبِّكَ لَقُضِيَ بَيۡنَهُمۡ فِيمَا فِيهِ يَخۡتَلِفُونَ

translation.en: And mankind was not but one community [united in religion], but [then] they differed. And if not for a word that preceded from your Lord, it would have been judged between them [immediately] concerning that over which they differ
translation.id: (Dan manusia dahulunya satu umat, kemudian mereka berselisih. Kalau tidak karena suatu ketetapan yang telah ada dari Tuhanmu,385) pastilah telah diberi keputusan (di dunia) di antara mereka, tentang apa yang mereka perselisihkan itu
